subject: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Attention: Sir/Madam,
I am Mr. Godwin Emefiele,former Governor of Central Bank of Nigeria,CBN.I have a receivership proposal to you. Kindly revert to me for details.
Meanwhile Here is news links for your perusal:
https:/ /dailypost.ng/2023/06/17/emefiele-dss-raises-alarm-over-campaign-of-calumny-warns-plotter
https:/ /www.youtube.com/watch?v=R2HCVivBewI
https:/ /web.facebook.com/ReportYourself/videos/watch-n89trillion-stamp-duty-buhari-gave-me-power-to-remove-detain-investigate-c/1092187778114689/?_rdc=1&_rdr
https:/ /www.youtube.com/watch?v=zDN9GYQOEvc
Yours sincerely,
Godwin Emefiele

subject: Re:   Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello Mr. Godwin Emefiele,

Thank you for reaching out to me with your proposal. I'm interested in learning more about it. Could you please provide me with some details?

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam, Re: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Dear Godwin Emefiele,

Thank you for reaching out to me with your proposal. I am interested in learning more about it. Could you please provide me with some details? What is the nature of the proposal and how can it benefit me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Dear Michael,

Sir,


Further to the consolidation of my mail purpose, please know that the new
government has been hounding me for the simple reason of my role during the
last regime of President Mohammed Buhari which strictly was in the purview
of my official responsibility.

The present regime of President Bola Ahmed Tinubu specifically saw my
participation as a presidential candidate in the same political party as
directed by the then president and the redesign of our currency before the
election as my personal policies to undermine his ambition thus the
relentless efforts to bring me and my associates to our knees, financially
socially, materially and otherwise.

In  light of this, I seek your honest co-operation in housing this fund for
our mutual benefit which I have tirelessly worked for all my life and which
the present government is planning to confiscate if nothing urgent is done
to move it away from where it is presently.

All my endeavors here has been seized including my wifeâ€™s jewelries and I
see that if they can go this extra mile, there is nothing they cannot do
just to humiliate me.
Most of these personal funds came as gratitude from the previous government
and commissions on international syndication where my advice by way of
consultancy played vital role specifically re my policy on stamp duties
generation which quadrupled the state revenues.

I sincerely seek your co-operation towards achieving this goal and thus
look forward to reading you earnestly as time is of essence.

Waiting for your soonest response.

Yours sincerely,
Godwin Emefiele

-- 
SUBJECT: RECEIVERSHIP PROPOSAL

Dear Sir,

I have a receivership proposal to you. Kindly revert to me for details.

Meanwhile Here is news links for your perusal:

https://dailypost.ng/2023/06/17/emefiele-dss-raises-alarm-over-campaign-of-calumny-warns-plotter

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R2HCVivBewI

https://web.facebook.com/ReportYourself/videos/watch-n89trillion-stamp-duty-buhari-gave-me-power-to-remove-detain-investigate-c/1092187778114689/?_rdc=1&_rdr

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zDN9GYQOEvc

Yours sincerely,
Godwin Emefiele

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello Michael,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like you are facing a challenging situation with the government. I understand your concerns about safeguarding your funds.

Could you provide more details about the proposal you mentioned? I would like to learn more about how I can assist you in this matter.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Attn Michael, Please NOTE that since I am still under investigation and in
detention,Honestly my hands are tied being in security detention and my
bank accounts blocked. I am not allowed to have access to my contacts
please try your best for me.

Now go ahead contact my attorney who will act on our behalf and procure the
necessary documents to enable you to receive the fund at the finance house
as scheduled.

Name: Lawrence Amadi
Email: lawrenceamadi840@gmail.com
Tel: +234-9168438403

I have entrusted you with this, and I hope you are capable and will not
betray me considering my precarious condition in the hands of security
operatives. Once the lawyer gets all the papers ready, kindly proceed to
the finance house to receive the fund and then alert me.Once again, thanks
for your cooperation.

Yours sincerely,
Godwin Emefiele.

--
